item.title: Fetch Friends
item.description: github refactor details Update function to perform a single query to supabase instead of nested queries. In supabase we have [[friend_list table]], this endpoint takes the JWT send in the request to define the user, then query this table the user’s friends ids then query again those ids to get full information (note: this function will be update later for a single query to supabase).

item.title: Fetch History
item.description: github This endpoint will fetch all users transaction on the [[transactions table]]. The table desn’t specify if the transaction is from a type send or receive, it only retrieve all transactions that the user was involved, being responsability of the front end to diferentiate a send transaction when the user’s id is on the from column, and define a receive transaction when the user’s id is on the to column.

item.title: Fetch Token Balance
item.description: github This endpoint will take the JWT token send in the body and retrieve the user’s [[wallet object]] , then simply call wallet.

item.title: Fetch User Nfts
item.description: github This endpoit make use of another API, Moralis. Why Moralis? Moralis indexes all nft transactions on a chain and provide all transactions information, with that it's possible to query all nft's that a certain wallet hold.

item.title: friend_list table
item.description: Link to supabse The friend list table contains a relation of one to many of users id, which each row has two columns the first holds the user’s id, the second is an id array that hold all user’s friends id.
